title: Behind The Idea #51: DaVita's Murky Economics
description: DaVita Inc has achieved a rare dual feat - be a staple in Berkshire Hathaway's portfolio and be a target of John Oliver's criticisms. The kidney dialysis provider exemplifies the murky ecosystem of healthcare providers and payments. Does that make it a short? We break down a recent article by Ethan Watkins to see if we can better understand this situation.
itunes:title: DaVita's Murky Economics
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: Pulling apart the supply and demand of healthcare services is a sticky business.
